column4: can anybody tell me if I can just download the new Ubuntu 7. something since I have now 6.10 without any major issues?
you can upgrade but that's not what you want?
Also how do change "fonts" in xchat?
settings
<mwe>tell me what I want then? Explain further!
I was asking you ;)
ok I got my new settings for the xchat fonts.... how about upgrading to 7.02 when 6.10
!upgrade | techie1
mwe.... I hear you. I am very pleased with the 6.10 so far
yes
i thought that upgrading to 7.02 would add other needed features.... but I am not sure.
It shouldn't
It should just update your program versions
and kernel etc.

I had a whole "fiasco" with home computer with double boot and had to re-install windows xp and lost ubuntu. Just today I have been able to get it all back and of course I had not been able to use Ubuntu. It is interesting how windows gobbled up ubuntu double boot and I had to re-install ubuntu.
you should have just reinstalled grub ;)
of course I had to re-install xchat to be here.
I was using gparted
if windows renders linux unbootable just reinstall grub. not the entire OS ;)
well if you removed the linux partition then ...
and ompaul I was using Gparted
